name: Coding Seekhho
bio: Coding Seekhho is a comprehensive programming education platform designed to make coding accessible for beginners and intermediate learners. The platform offers practical, hands-on tutorials and bootcamps covering programming fundamentals, web development, and modern technologies. With a focus on real-world applications, Coding Seekhho helps students build practical coding skills through project-based learning. The courses emphasize understanding core concepts, writing clean code, and applying programming principles to solve actual problems.
teachingStyle: Beginner-friendly tutorials with hands-on coding practice, real-world assignments, and emphasis on building practical skills
achievements: Created beginner-friendly programming courses covering multiple languages and technologies
Helped thousands of students start their programming journey with confidence
Focus on practical, project-based learning for real-world application
Known for breaking down complex programming concepts into simple, understandable lessons
